tool.name: Extract DBSNP and VCF region and annotate VCF File
tool.description: Reads fom a specified region of both DBSNP and target VCF file, then using SNPsift annotates the file accordingly

param.name: display_region
param.label: Extract records from this region
param.help: The format of the region is ref:start-end, where the start and end coordinates are 1-based

param.name: region
param.label: Type in region
param.help: The format of the region is ref:start-end, where the and end coordinates are 1-based
